seo_keywords: Shark Apex brush roll indicator flashing
Shark AZ1002 soft roller not spinning

problems.title: Brush Roll Light Flashing
problems.description: The nozzle lights flash and the brush stops spinning.
possible_causes: Soft roller garage not closed properly
Debris jam in the rear brush
solution_steps: Slide the 'Access' buttons to open the lid. Ensure it clicks firmly when closing.
Check the small hose at the bottom of the head for cracks.

problems.title: Handle Hose Split
problems.description: Suction loss and hissing near the handle.
possible_causes: Wear and tear on the stretch hose
solution_steps: This is a non-repairable part of the handle assembly.
You must replace the entire handle/hose unit.
